comment._content: Thank you all so much for uploading these imagery! Such a beautiful way to respect history and photography.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.censusdiggins.com/prison_camp_douglas.html "Camp Douglas was located in Chicago near the shores of Lake Michigan. It was known as the northern prison camp with the highest mortality rate of all Union Civil War prisons."
